caption.p: Mean average luminescence, represented as relative light units (RLU) adjusted for protein concentration, measured after lysis of cells incubated with either electrosprayed modified vaccinia Ankara (MVA) ( A) or adenovirus (Ad) ( B) at three multiplicities of infection (MOIs). Working distance: 7.25cm, flow rate: 10 ÂµL/min. Error bars represent the standard deviation ( n = 3).
